plugin.name: mcrit-ida
plugin.description: Integration with MCRIT server for code similarity analysis.

settings.name: MCRITWeb Username
settings.documentation: Username for MCRITWeb (optional if API Token is provided).

settings.name: Auto Analyze SMDA on Startup
settings.documentation: Automatically convert IDB to SMDA on plugin startup.

settings.name: Submit Function Names on Close
settings.documentation: Ask to upload updated function names to MCRIT server on close.

settings.name: Blocks: Filter Library Functions
settings.documentation: Filter out library functions in Block Scope Widget.

settings.name: Blocks: Live Query
settings.documentation: Enable live query in Block Scope Widget.

settings.name: Blocks: Minimum Size
settings.documentation: Minimum block size for Block Scope Widget.

settings.name: Functions: Filter Library Functions
settings.documentation: Filter out library functions in Function Scope Widget.

settings.name: Functions: Live Query
settings.documentation: Enable live query in Function Scope Widget.

settings.name: Functions: Minimum Score
settings.documentation: Minimum score for Function Scope Widget.

settings.name: Overview: Fetch Labels Automatically
settings.documentation: Automatically fetch labels in Function Overview Widget.

settings.name: Overview: Filter to Labels
settings.documentation: Filter to labels in Function Overview Widget.

settings.name: Overview: Filter to Conflicts
settings.documentation: Filter to conflicts in Function Overview Widget.

settings.name: Overview: Minimum Score
settings.documentation: Minimum score for Function Overview Widget.
